publications: [{"title":"Design and Control of SLIDER: An Ultra-lightweight, Knee-less, Low-cost Bipedal Walking Robot","subtitle":"IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (Under Review)","date":"September 15, 2019"},{"title":"Thermal Modelling and Simulation for ‘Pratham’ IIT Bombay student satellite","subtitle":"67th International Astronautical Congress, Mexico (leading conference in space technology)","date":"October 10, 2016"},{"title":"Structural Design, Analysis and Testing of Launch Vehicle Interface for Small Satellite, Pratham, IIT Bombay","subtitle":"67th International Astronautical Congress, Mexico (leading conference in space technology)","date":"October 9, 2016"}]
projects: [{"title":"Chain Reaction Game | Team Leader","start_date":"Oct 2014","description":"Built and developed the popular game \"Chain Reaction\" using C++ programming language in a team of 3 members. Customized and upgraded the game from 2 to 8 players and added a new feature of playing single player."},{"title":"Characteristics of a flapping wing | Summer Undergraduate Research Project (SURP)","start_date":"May 2016","end_date":"Jul 2016","description":"Inspired by the flight of birds, the project aims to build a fully functional ornithopter which can be used or surveillance, military applications, traffic monitoring, etc."},{"title":"Analysis of a cooling system for Beam accelerator","start_date":"Dec 2015","end_date":"Mar 2016","description":"The project involved modelling and simulating the environmental model considering conduction, forced convection, natural convection and radiation in ANSYS Fluent."},{"title":"Robotic Arm | Institute Technical Summer Project","start_date":"Apr 2015","end_date":"Jul 2015","description":"Designed and fabricated an arduino based miniaturized robotic arm where once the input coordinates are given by the user it repeats the motion continuously in a loop.Basically a miniaturized version of automated robotic arms used on production lines in factories and industries."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Undergraduate Research Award
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded Undergraduate Research Award for exemplary research in the Ornithopter project.
